name: Less Is More (Brobak)
description:
Your goal is to get the little minion to the green goal. Unfortunately your minion is dumb as bricks so you'll have to build walls wo guide him. The fewer walls you have to build the better.

However each level has a twist or a special rule that will allow you to solve it using 1 move or less, if you can find it...

You control the game entirely using the mouse. Click and drag to place walls, use right mouse button to cancel.
